thread.title: Simon from Cheshire
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Simon from Cheshire

author: Simon from Cheshire
title: Simon from Cheshire
text: Great service - mechanic contacted me a couple of times prior to appointment to confirm everything. Very helpful and professional. Done in about 45 mins. Great value and extremely convenient not having to take my car and sit around waiting for tyres to be fitted.
